==Gameplay Notes==

==Trivia==
* {{w|Ītzpāpālōtl}} was a death goddess and the queen of the Tzitzimimeh in {{w|Aztec Mythology}}.
===Etymology===
* ''{{w|Ītzpāpālōtl}}'', means "Obsidian Butterfly" in {{w|Nahuatl}}.
